name: Kittie Reaper: A Depressed Cat Tale
name_original: Kittie Reaper: A Depressed Cat Tale
description:
A game for LD 40 - Made in One Weekend

The Kittie Reapers is depressed and no longer wants to take life... but she still has a job to do.  Help her dodge innocent bystanders and trudge through her job while taking the very minimum amount of life necessary to keep her job.

Check out our Ludum Dare Page

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/kittie-reaper-a-depressed-cat-tale
